title: mAtangi sharaNam
sahitya:
mAtangi sharaNam sangItAngi sharaNam jaya


anupallavi

  nAda svarUpiNi shakti nAraNi sakala kalA pUraNi


caraNam    tEnum pAlum amudum kani rasamum pOl divya shArIram taruvAi
gAna sukhattinAl mAniDa vAzhkkaiyin kavalaiyai mATri varuvAi
tiruvE kalaiyin uruvE vidyA guruvE karpakat-taru pOl udavum
